projects.title: Global Cybersecurity Portfolio
projects.context: Led a program to update the look and feel and internal protocols of Single Sign-On (SSO) for 9 countries across Canada, Latin America, and the Caribbean.
projects.action: Coordinated with local project teams, balancing regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions and protecting intellectual property. Managed ~$21M CAD and a team of ~300 staff members (FTEs and Contractors), orchestrating multiple areas including legal and technology.
projects.impact: Successfully standardized SSO processes across 9 jurisdictions, ensuring seamless technological updates and full regulatory compliance.

projects.title: Mortgage Compliance OSFI (Canada)
projects.context: A $5M CAD program required by the Canadian regulator (OSFI) to update systems for the mortgage threshold of interest rates.
projects.action: Managed FTEs and Contractors to review, update, and test ~30 applications across the bank interface. Implemented the system update running in phased increments for each technology.
projects.impact: Completed the project with <5% budget variance and deployed time benefits in the baseline as required, executing 100% of regulatory mandates.

projects.title: Enterprise Robotics Ecosystem
projects.context: Designed and coordinated the product lifecycle of robotic products impacting 80% of the company's areas, including taxes, contact center, collections, AML, and HR.
projects.action: Automated and created new technology solutions for end-to-end processes across the enterprise. Designed 24 automations and solutions from scratch.
projects.impact: Generated ~30 to 50 FTEs in saved costs and created new capacity for value-add activities, enabling teams to tackle new assignments.
